attributes.action: Stop the rampant panda from maiming cats and Xbox 360's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a rampant panda going around destroying 360's and maiming cats.

Some say, it's Sony planted.

We must destroy this creature.

The future of Live depends on the undersigned.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
